title: Iraqi forces push towards Hawija
description:
(1 Oct 2017) Iraqi forces on Saturday continued their advance towards Hawija, the last major Islamic State-held territory in the country.
The 10th brigade of Hashd el-Shaabi, a mainly Shiite pro-government militia group, said it had taken some 15 villages in the area near the al-Las oilfields in the past two days and were about to reach to Hawija highway.
The forces also encountered some civilians who said that IS fighters had pulled out of the area as the Iraqis advanced.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/412e57ded1075163722ddb1374638a54 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
